Your next crypto currency

HyperStake is an experiment in cryptocurrency economics. Do you like living on the bleeding edge of technological advancements and getting? Then HyperStake is for you.

Wallets

Download our wallets available for Linux, Mac OS, Windows, Raspberry Pi or build it from source. We're open source and available on Github.

Technical details

  • X11 PoW blocks already phased out
  • Proof of Stake Blocks Only
  • 90 Second Block Time
  • Annual Interest Rate 750%
  • Minimum Age 8.8 days
  • Maximum Age 30 days
  • Maximum Stake Subsidy 1,000 HYP
  • Recommended Block Size 5,000-20,000 HYP
